div.div: The list of activitySets is obtained from the cKAN repository and results in an updated activitySet document in the data/{corpus} directory. This master file is used in downloading the activitySet itself from its host site. Each actovity in the activitySet is processed through a pipeline of transformations and then written as a document in the data{corpus}/activities directory
activitySets can also be uploaded directly from a URL

The application provides a basic browser for loaded activities. The OLAP provides a faceted view of the activities as well as views by host or all activities. Activities can be searched using Lucene by free text in the title or the description.
